website_summaries.verdict: This popular inflatable costume stands nearly 7 feet tall and is practically guaranteed to be a hit at Halloween parties. Not for big or tall users, however.
pros: Maximum entertainment value for children's parties
cons: Seams can become uncomfortable or abrasive

customer_reviews.title: ... for my wedding to surprise my husband it was perfect for what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Wore this for my wedding to surprise my husband it was perfect for what I needed. My only complaint is there is nothing inside the costume to put the battery box thing. If there is I haven't seen it.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: So life like!!!
customer_reviews.text: It has got to be the goofiest looking things when you start walking in it, the head flops back and you end up looking like an overly excited toddler. I saw a video of someone wearing this costume re-enacting a Jurassic Park scene on YouTube, and right then, I knew I had to have it. Putting the costume on for the first time was a bit of a challenge. you have to put your head and arms in first, and then put your legs in. Only complaint, my wife is leaving me because I haven't taken it off for 3 weeks now.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon Reed

customer_reviews.title: BEST PURCHASE I HAVE EVER MADE
customer_reviews.text: BEST PURCHASE I HAVE EVER MADE!!!!!!!! Seriously, how awesome is this costume? So many applications. I didn't even buy it for Halloween. I literally just wanted to dress up like a T-Rex from time to time. Life is tough, sometimes you just want to feel happy. So, T-Rex costume. My son loves it. I put it on and we have dance parties. It's the little things. Two small thumbs on very short arms up!
customer_reviews.author: JPie612

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Costume. Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Extremely durable. Went to a night club and everyone was taking pictures with me. All the girls were grinding up on me. Was a hilarious time.
customer_reviews.author: Dalphin

customer_reviews.title: I ordered this thinking it would simply have one use ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this thinking it would simply have one use and that was it. However now that I have one it is difficult to understand why everyone doesn't own one. So many additional uses as well: -Halloween Costume -Cosplay -Blending in with ACTUAL raptors once Jurasic Park becomes a reality -Frightening your dog -Blending into nature -Frightening your neighbors dog -A makeshift hazmat suit -And much more, most likely I don't know what more reason you need. It is a F#$%ing raptor suit!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tim Mark

customer_reviews.title: Amazing costume!!
customer_reviews.text: Best money ever spent on Amazon! Everyone LOVES this costume and I have so much fun wearing it. Worth every penny!! I am 5'4" and about 120lbs and there is lots of room. My brother is 6' and about 175 and it fits him also.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I scared my dog and he tried to jump through ...
customer_reviews.text: I scared my dog and he tried to jump through a closed window while leaving my girlfriend to her fate. Now I know he's only here for the free food and shelter.
customer_reviews.author: JRSelf

customer_reviews.title: All the Dinosaurs feared the T-Rex.
customer_reviews.text: Where to begin with this gem. This was the 3rd t-Rex I bought. I now have a family of t-Rex outfits, and suffice to say we stole the show for our Halloween party. I will say, you have to be on the shorter side of life in order for this to fit. There is plenty of room once inside, but getting in can be a bit tedious. Don't expect to eat, or drink while wearing this. It stays surprisingly cool as well, as there is a constant intake of fresh air. If you can find it for a great price, I'd snatch it up. I have seen this fluctuate from $50 to over $200.
customer_reviews.author: CoreyZ

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous for Older Kids and Just Plain Fun!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to write a review because sizing info is so hard to pin down on this costume. After much debate on whether or not we should risk the youth version of this or try the adult size for a 9yo, we ended up going with the adult version and it's perfect! He's 9 years old and 4' 6". He can see perfectly. The costume is comedic, which is exactly what he was going for. I wouldn't recommend this for a party where there a lot of activities or isn't much space though. I have this four stars because the fan was a little disappointing and it took a long time for the costume to inflate.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WARNING - They sent me a Medium, not a one size fits all adult!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. This was going to be a big Christmas surprise to wear this Christmas day and surprise my sister but found as putting on the costume it was WAY too small. Looking at what was sent it said Medium on the package though the listing says Adult one size fits all. Even the reviews said it fit bigger adults, I think they just sent the wrong one. Either way it was a huge Christmas let down and now have to return.
customer_reviews.author: Beatlesfan1177

customer_reviews.title: FAN BROKEN!!! Rubies Costumes please fix this...
customer_reviews.text: I got theT-rex costume and the fan doesn't work at all. A lot of my friends have ordered this costume and have had the same problem. I was so excited for this costume and now I will not be able to get a replacement in time for Halloween... Very disappointed to say the least.
customer_reviews.author: RicoGsxr750

customer_reviews.title: Majestic 6 Foot Turkey
customer_reviews.text: This is the best Amazon purchase I've ever made. Pictured here is my 10 year old son, waving at neighbors who weren't quite sure if they should laugh or call the game warden. I'm going to wear this thing to get the mail from now on. And to work. It's fantastic! My son is just shy of 4.5 feet tall. I was hesitant to get a "Standard size" but it works! It. Is. Hot. Hoping for a chilly Halloween!
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: T. rex gone wild.
customer_reviews.text: Immediate fun. People were beeping their car horns, adults were laughing, kids were running for their lives. Ok the kids were crying but that's life. The only reason why I didn't give it 5 stars is because it does get hot inside and the windows will fog up. I would make sure you're hydrated and not wear it over a long period of time especially in direct sunlight. Someone left a review and said so life like. I don't know what their referencing because I've never seen a real life T. rex but it's definitely unique costume.
customer_reviews.author: YamSS

customer_reviews.title: Great costume, definitely do not wear if you like ...
customer_reviews.text: Great costume, definitely do not wear if you like attention. Reason for 1 star off -- I wore this out treat-or-treating with my son. Once the sun starts going down, it is very hard to see out of due to screening of the lookout portion, as well as that plastic portion fogging up. It also has a plastic seam that, at least for me, kept rubbing on my forehead and became quite uncomfortable. I would advise wearing a sweatband on your forehead and perhaps (sounds stupid but it works), a sock full of unscented cat litter to pull out the moisture from within the costume to prevent it from fogging up.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy if tall.
customer_reviews.text: I'm 6'4" and of average build for reference. While the chest and arms fit (mind you if you're tall your arms go a bit funny, effectively you have to "t-rex arm" so it fits), since it doesnt list a size based on packaging (It's a medium) there was no way to figure out length. So I have a costume that fits from the waist up, but the legs ride up to my shins. If I had known that I would have attempted to find a larger costume.
customer_reviews.author: Jay B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect getaway costume.
customer_reviews.text: Do you have a need to scare police dogs? A need to look like a giant toddler T-Rex? Or maybe you just like to hide in the pillowy sheath that is the TREX? Then this is the costume for YOU. It's relatively quiet if your not the person inside the TREX and the batteries last for a surprisingly long time. Just be careful when you try to run away from said police dog, the crotch rides really low and you're more likely to "waddle" than run.
customer_reviews.author: MeganTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Scared the **** out of my grandson.
customer_reviews.text: This costume was a hit at my three-year-old grandson's birthday party. He wanted a "dinosaur theme" for his birthday party so I thought this would be a great idea. When I came through the gate with this costume on he lost his mind! When I unzipped the costume and popped out he saw it was just granddad. I asked him if he wanted to get inside with me and the response was "of course"! It fits me well, I'm 5'-9".
customer_reviews.author: B. OwenTop Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: Not for anyone over 5'7
customer_reviews.text: I love this costume, I really do, but for an adult's one-size fits all, it is not for any adult taller than 5'7. As a 5'8 female I struggled to get into it without breaking the zipper. The length of the zipper isn't ideal for adults. It isn't about weight or size of the person, it is strictly the height. If you're on the all side, this particular dinosaur costume won't fit. That's not to say others won't. I ordered a unicorn for my nieces and their father who is 6'3 ended up wearing it without difficulty.
customer_reviews.author: MR

customer_reviews.title: Hunger for attention?
customer_reviews.text: Everyone will be looking at you... everyone. Then they'll tell other people who will also be looking at you. Works wonderfully as an affordable hater-radar. Haters will instantly reveal themselves to you unprovoked! Helped to win first place as part of a Jurassic Park-themed team effort at an office costume/decorating contest. Sat in the cubicle with it on no problem. The clear window WILL get fogged up on a cool Halloween night, which we also used it for, so be cautious as it will become almost impossible to see. Meeting another hostile T-Rex in the street and immediately initiating a tiny arms fight however... well worth the effort required.
customer_reviews.author: OldCornerGlassworks

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: We really love this costume! We bought two adult sizes and one children's version. It's so much fun! I can't speak for the longevity of it since I only tried it on once, but so far, it seems great. The material is thin and plastic, so it feels like it could rip easily, but that's the same with any blow up costume from any brand. We've worn costumes like this in the past so we already knew what to expect and don't anticipate any problems. For what it is, it's a lot of fun. It's a bit challenging to see out of and walk in, but it really brings a smile to people's face. Enjoy and be safe out there!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely hysterical ...... this was a great buy!
customer_reviews.text: This was hilarious, we showed Jurassic Park as a drive-in movie at the fair grounds. We had the right person with the greatest personality get in the suit. At the beginning of the movie we had “Rex” handing out free bottles of flavored water to all the vehicles coming in.. During the movie, rex occasionally strolled through the rows of cars...keeping a safe distance of course. Then when it came time to leave we gave Rex two traffic flashlights and he directed traffic....dancing all the time! The suit was great. It even made our Rex person walk comical. We may only get to use this one time.... but the laughs were worth the purchase price.
customer_reviews.author: Milda Hadaway

customer_reviews.title: OMG
customer_reviews.text: Ok, this thing does have some flaws but the funny factor outweighs all of them and had to give this five stars just for that. My 13 year old grandson wore this for Halloween and it was the funniest thing ever and drew a lot of attention. It is reported that it is difficult to run (funny to watch) and you don't have much use of hands with the gloves on. This is pretty cool and has a built in fan that keeps it inflated. It worked the whole time it was worn and runs on batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Renaissance Man

customer_reviews.title: SO VERY DISAPPOINTING - Kids-sized Costume - NOT for Adults
customer_reviews.text: This costume is NOT adult size. My husband is 6' tall and wears and Adult M/L. The costume would not even come up over his shoulders. It is made for a child. The adult sizing marked on the packaging is false. I would NOT purchase this item again. Fortunately, my husband thought to try on the costume prior Halloween so now we have time to acquire another costume.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry R. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Dreams Do Come True.
customer_reviews.text: When I was a kid, when I was a little boy, I always wanted to be a dinosaur, I wanted to be a Tyrannosaurus Rex more than anything in the world, I made my arms short and I roamed the back yard, I chased the neighborhood cats, I growled and I roared, everybody knew me and was afraid of me, and one day my dad said "Bobby you are 17, it's time to throw childish things aside" and I said "OK Pop", but he didn't really say that he said that "Stop being a dinosaur and get a job".
customer_reviews.author: wokka wokka

customer_reviews.title: Would have been five stars but broke before she could wear it out
customer_reviews.text: So my daughter had to have this for her Halloween costume. She is 13. It fit well and I’m not going to deny it’s freaking hilarious. She tried it on the day she got it , and another time last weekend. The wire completely snapped out of the fan and we cannot get it to fix. Now I’m out the cost of this and trying to rush and find another costume. My daughter is so upset. The costume itself seemed to be well quality but if just her putting the costume on broke it, I’m not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: bethany

customer_reviews.title: I want to love it, but....
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'10" and the fit for the velociraptor is fine.... I want to love this costume. We ordered 2, one for my girlfriend and one for me. We checked the fan on the first one and it worked. The second one didn't so we requested a new one and we got a new one. The new one's fan works, but the costume has a hole directly underneath the fan. We really love the design of this costume so we ordered ANOTHER replacement... Hopefully this next one is ok.
customer_reviews.author: JoseF123

customer_reviews.title: Ruined Halloween (first time)
customer_reviews.text: Both the zipper and Motor were completely broken. I was really disappointed this didn’t work out for my kids. The fan wasn't powerful, we changed lots of batteries, it seemed the motor did not work at all. The fan just made a sound like this di-di-di-di-di. The shipment was right on time package .Sadly, only one star because my kids couldn’t use it for Halloween. My son put it on and the zipper broke right off. super sad.Halloween had been ruined :(
customer_reviews.author: claudia GOMEZ

customer_reviews.title: Better quality then other Amazon sellers. Great costume!
customer_reviews.text: Great dino costume. Originally bought from another seller for a few dollars less but had to return it because of poor quality. Rubie’s dino costume is excellent. It has a strong zipper and the fan works very well. This fits my 50” tall grandson, my 5’1” granddaughter, and I am 5’6” and I can wear it too. It is extremely easy to put on and off. It is for my grandson and he is able to unzip and put his head out anytime he wants and the costume stays inflated. We were worried that he wouldn’t be able to wear it during out party but he will be able to eat and have conversations without taking the costume off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome. Note, It gets hot in these dinos.
customer_reviews.text: Loved it. I can't quite figure out the harness inside, there were no instructions for that part. I tucked ice packs in my clothes and was able to wear it longer than my friends. I might fab up some suspenders to hold it up a tad as I am a 5'6" female. I like that the tail doesn't drag but as you can see the tail sticks out a ways so it is a bit difficult moving indoors. You can roll up the tail and secure with a non metal hairtie if needed.
customer_reviews.author: 🙊🙉🙈

customer_reviews.title: Great except for the zipper but still worth it.
customer_reviews.text: My 12 year old wore this for Halloween. He loved it and it was a hit while trick or treating. It’s pretty good quality except for the zipper. We returned twice after the zipper came apart when he first put it on. The rest of the costume is really sturdy. Zipper is really cheap plastic. Once we tightened the edge of the zipper it stayed. We figured out how to fix it so it wasn’t a big deal. Other than the zipper, this would have been easily 5 stars. Heads up though- carry extra batteries. His batteries got low and the costume wouldn’t inflate completely.
customer_reviews.author: iamhere

customer_reviews.title: Probably one of the best purchases I ever made on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: My youngest daughter has loved dinosaurs since birth. Graduating this year and she wants to pursue paleontology and marine biology. Her first run in the costume to was to deliver her Dad a bouquet of balloons while he was in the gym....so in front of all of his workout buddies. It was HYSTERICAL! She has worn it to community events and Halloween parties in the neighborhood. We have definitely gotten our moneys worth out of it. She has about outgrown it now but if she asked for another, bigger one I would buy it in a heartbeat!
customer_reviews.author: CMac

customer_reviews.title: When the Dinosaurs roam, we all win!
customer_reviews.text: I like it! Got this for my 15 year old. As described. My son is 5'7 about 155 lbs. We added 4 AA batteries, made sure all the arms/legs were sealed (elastic is built in to the openings) and turned on the battery pack that powers the mini fan. Despite being a little wrinkled from packing, it looks good. (I added the ROAR sound effect). This gives you an idea how it looks. Turns out, Halloween is around the corner, so this is a win/win!
customer_reviews.author: Damazon Prime

customer_reviews.title: Teens grow
customer_reviews.text: I loved it! Awesome my child loved it they are 10 years old in the 5th grade weighs about 65lbs and it about 4 feet and 10 inches and it fit perfect, maybe a bit too perfect. i was afraid of purchasing the adult one vs. the teen one aka this one but this one pit him just right in perfect height to where he can see the window. But he loved it so much he wants to reuse again the problem is that he is definitely growing so maybe I should have boughten the adult one instead as he pretty tall and getting to 5 feet very soon. Other than that was my only con, everything else perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loads of fun
customer_reviews.text: I cannot begin to say how much fun it was to wear this around the neighborhood with my kids, nieces and nephews to trick or treat. People would wave me up to their house to give me candy and thank me for the good laugh. The costume is sturdy and I had no problems with it. The head sticks up pretty high, I ran into tree branches and it didn't rip. Just remember how tall it is. The blower did what it was supposed to do. Highly recommend for lots of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa O.

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: Love this dinosaur outfit. I have used it a few times to show up to my friends house and surprise their kids. I also have walked around my neighborhood just to cheer people up during quarantine. No one can resist a Dinosaur! It does get warm if it is warm out, also the plastic part to see through can get foggy when you breath, which is expected. It is Easy to put on and use. I am 5'7 and it fits fine, but I can see if fitting better if I was taller.
customer_reviews.author: J. Murphy

customer_reviews.title: A little pricey, but super funny
customer_reviews.text: We got the teenage fit and it fits my 10 yr old almost perfectly. I'm assuming an actual teenager would need the adult fit. $50 is a little steep, but it's hilarious watching him run around in it. He's been wearing it often and it seems like it will hold up. He got it for Halloween but runs around in it constantly. He will be able to bundle up underneath it as well, if he needs to.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Sadly disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: The inflatable velociraptor costume would have been fantastic in looks and function. However, the top of the zipper area was improperly sewn all the way, leaving an area for air to escape, and the fan motor was noisily laboring a bit with a slight burning smell, well beyond what my similar previous T-Rex costume did. The inside packaging it came in was also opened when delivered, so I am not sure if it was a returned item or not. Really too bad, because it had great potential and I think would have been just as good as my T-Rex. So sad! Now too late to get a replacement in time for Halloween.
customer_reviews.author: Nudge

customer_reviews.title: Bought it and then when it came time to use it, fan lasted for maybe a half hour.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointing as it is still a reasonably costly costume and without a functioning fan it is garbage. Upon removing the fan and seeing what the issue was, the blower/blades came detached from the motor shaft but whatever was attaching it was all powdery. I also noted that there should have been 2 screws holding the motor to the casing but only one was present, meaning this was defective right from the manufacturer. I would expect to be sent a replacement motor at the very least as I don't think I can even return this item now.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! Great costume!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it because I was planning on making my little nephew (who love dinosaurs) smile on his birthday on this Covid time. As soon as we got the costume my husband tried it and starting dancing ... I laughed until I cried. Great costume, easy to put on (head first!). Material looks good, we tried it with the pump on the whole time, but I don’t think the air will got out as it has elastic on the arms and legs. I can’t wait for my nephew to see his uncle on it ;D
customer_reviews.author: Herbert Guerrero

customer_reviews.title: Makes me smile.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for myself as a gift since anytime I see someone in a dinosaur costume it brightens my day! When I read the reviews quite a few people remarked about the size being too small. Not sure what they were talking about because it's actually quite roomy. You do have to pay attention on how to put it on and it does help to crouch a little. The costume was well made but it is hot ! I used a neck fan to help keep me cool when wearing. It was a big hit and now my 6 year old wants us to go as a dinosaur family for next Halloween!
customer_reviews.author: snappyj

customer_reviews.title: FUN!
customer_reviews.text: This was a hit at my sons birthday party. I am 6'1" and 200lbs. It fit just right with the exception of the legs. I have long legs so i won't drop a star for my ankles being exposed. My only real "con" comment is this thing gets HOT. Next time, I will hope for a cool day. It was 100 degrees outside and probably 120 inside this thing. There was so much condensation on the viewing windows that the kids turned into colored blurs. It was hot enough that i was thoroughly soaked in sweat after 30 minutes. In the end it was worth it to see the kids' faces and interaction.
customer_reviews.author: NormalGuy

customer_reviews.title: If over 6' you may have troubles seeing
customer_reviews.text: I am 6' tall, i would say you would want to be much taller to be able o see through the window. I got this for my 10 year old son who is about 5'. we knew this would be big on him and the kids version would be too small. we opted for the adult and were glad we did. It was big and he a little trouble seeing through the window, but overall was good. I am 6'-230lb; it fit me pretty well, i would have wanted the window little higher. but would have worked for me. I would say if 6-2" or taller might be stretching it.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Hanson

customer_reviews.title: POOR QUALITY- BROKE RIGHT BEFORE TRICK-OR-TREATING
customer_reviews.text: MY SON ORDERED THIS COSTUME AND WHEN HE WENT TO PUT IT ON HALLOWEEN EVENING, THE ZIPPER WAS BROKEN. HE COULD NOT EVEN WEAR HIS COSTUME AND IT WAS HALLOWEEN NIGHT. I GUESS I SHOULD OF LET HIM TRY IT ON BEFORE HALLOWEEN, LIKE HE WAS BEGGING ME TO DO, BECAUSE THEN I WOULD OF SAW THAT IT WAS BROKEN AND WOULD OF HAD TIME TO GET A NEW COSTUME. INSTEAD HE HAD NO COSTUME! IT WAS HORRIBLE!
customer_reviews.author: Ang

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I have zero regret about buying this item. It did fit a little smaller than expected, but I could still easily wear it. It provided so much laughter and fun and was the highlight of my week when it came in the mail. It did get a small tear in the tail the first time I used it, but I wore it on very rough terrain and hope to reinforce it with tape for the next time. The tear was so small that it would still inflate and work, but not fully inflate. It is completely worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Tori Rayle

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to love it but.....
customer_reviews.text: We purchased two of these for our sons and both had zipper issues right out of the bag. My older son's costumes zipper separated the first time he tried to zip it up, thankfully I was able to fix it, but my younger son's zipper came apart when trying to zip it up and we could not get it back on track. Pretty much sucked because one son was happy and the other was pretty pissed. We ordered a new one and I figure we have a 50/50 chance the zipper on this one will suck too. You'd think for a costume this expensive they could spring for a metal zipper and not plastic one.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron R Linehan

customer_reviews.title: Such a great costume...if it worked!
customer_reviews.text: This item will be the death of me! My 12 year old has been begging for this and I finally bought it for him. Well, he stepped into it and as he went to zip it up, we realized the zipper was off track. We think it was a return because it didn’t have the “hands” in the first one and wasn’t even in a bag- just in a box. Sent back and received replacement quickly but it leaked air! The costume won’t stay inflated! Decided to buy somewhere else because I feel like we keep receiving items that were sent back.
customer_reviews.author: Cajun Gal

customer_reviews.title: This fits 5'3" me and a 5'10" man just fine.
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure how this thing was going to work, but I really like it! It seems to be thought out well. It's plastic, but it has this battery operated fan inside of it so it keeps inflated as well as keeps the person inside cool! Well, anyone wearing a T-Rex costume is going to be cool, but this keeps you cool weatherwise!
customer_reviews.author: SnafoooTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Great costume - short life
customer_reviews.text: This was a super fun costume for awhile. We got it two weeks before Halloween, and my son wore it around the house a few times before the big day. It was great. The night we actually went trick or treating, though, the motor started making a rattling sound, and then died. I was just going to contact their customer service about replacing the motor, but I am one day past the return time and don't have access to that now. So - beware. Awesome costume, save for Halloween if you want to be safe.
customer_reviews.author: skyebean

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made fan
customer_reviews.text: The outfit was used twice and, after that, the fan started making loud noises. Looking inside the unit, I could see the spinning fan was wobbling all over the place. It partially detached from the housing. I pinged the seller and didn't receive any feedback at all. Real Nice. After that, I decided to open the housing and take a look. The fan was mounted and glued to a tiny spinning pin. Checking the hole in the fan vs the pin size, I can see if is obviously not a tight fit. Now I need a new fan.
customer_reviews.author: bljjc

customer_reviews.title: The power within
customer_reviews.text: Loved this costume! I'm 5'4" and it probably seemed like I was a bit short. I definitely felt powerful and like I might eat my cat so I slipped it off. The fan came attached to the costume already and my costume was already opened but had no damage, stains or issues. I recommend having some help with putting it on. Do not eat the person who helps you.
customer_reviews.author: Red

customer_reviews.title: We loved walking the dog in it
customer_reviews.text: Hilarious costume!!! We loved walking the dog in it! This makes everything better! If you are over 6' this may be too short for you.
customer_reviews.author: @theskinnymango_

customer_reviews.title: Loved this costume - but it is hot inside!
customer_reviews.text: Fan didn't work at first but I smacked it and it started working, lol. Suit is awesomely awesome, everyone who saw it automatically started laughing....and backing away, lol By the way.........believes what they say it is hot as heck inside the costume after about 10 minutes, even outside. The fan that is attached at low waist level is pointed down, you'd think if it was pointed up and blowing up the the face area it would be cooler and less fogged up. But it's awesome anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great costume, cheap zipper
customer_reviews.text: My kids loved this costume, however, the zipper is cheap and broke after the second or third time worn, coming off of its track. (this happened to two versions of this costume purchased) We had to pull the zipper assembly apart at the end of the costume on halloween and re-thread the zipper back on and re-align the teeth. Great costume, but it really does need a better zipper if you don't want a potential costume emergency right before trick-or-treating.
customer_reviews.author: Eph

customer_reviews.title: Gonna make you sweat
customer_reviews.text: On a cool night (40F) I was sweating like I had been doing a marathon. To say this thing is hot is an understatement. It’s poorly finished inside making it scratchy where seems touch skin. I’m 5’10” and had to contort in weird ways to get in and out, but I could imagine someone taller still making it work. The batteries lasted at least 4 hours before slowing down. It could take light rain just fine but was hard to see out of, especially as condensation built up. For a cheap costume, it was about all you could expect. Kids absolutely love it and that’s all that really mattered.
customer_reviews.author: CarlTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Velociraptor!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Adult Sized Velociraptor with Sound for my 5 feet tall, 10 year old son. It fits him perfectly. It looks very impressive and makes him well over 6 feet tall. It needs 4 AA batteries (NOT rechargeable). The sound box already has batteries in it. The zipper seems fine and sturdy. It has elastic around the feet so you can wear shoes.
customer_reviews.author: C. Shepard

customer_reviews.title: Return issues
customer_reviews.text: I had received my item, fan didn’t work and received a replacement in a very timely manner. Great suit, the kids all loved it. However, I attempted to return the defective item before the 30 day mark, and the QR code was no longer valid, when I tried to get another code, I was unable to find any way to get another like the message stated I could, and I couldn’t find anywhere to contact the seller to explain the issues. I’m not going to be charged for the extra T-rex that I cannot use. I wasn’t really sure where else to turn but to write a review in hopes someone contacts me.
customer_reviews.author: Jaimi Lafon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Super cute costume. I bought this for my sons birthday. It was perfect. It does get pretty warm in the costume which is not ideal since this birthday party is in July however it will work just fine for the party. It blows up pretty quickly. The sound effects are a cool added bonus as well. My sister is 5'4 tall and it fit her perfectly. I couldnt get the costume over my shoulders and I am 5'9.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We are getting Married in These!
customer_reviews.text: My fiance and I live in Tn. Long story short they have now made it illegal to be married by anyone online, Which threw a huge monkey wrench in our plans. NOT TODAY SATAN!! I came up with this idea of getting married in these since we will have to go down to the courthouse ( or a church <><>) before our actual wedding day to be married. If they are going to make this into a thing, I am going to do it my way!! HAHAHA this Bride-Dino will be posting pics once it happens! LOVE THESE! even really great for standing by the road and dancing for cars at rushhour!
customer_reviews.author: aly

customer_reviews.title: Really fun, fits almost everyone, shoddy wiring.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of these for my kids and I. Fits all of us fine. My kids are 8 and 10, 4'5" and 5'. I'm 5'9". They are tons of fun to play with! My daughter was the star of the children's museum Halloween event. Unfortunately her time was cut short when the wiring broke in the fan. Mine broke in the same way a week ago. I can solder it back together but it's a bummer that 2 of the 3 broke within a couple of weeks. I'm going to reinforce the other costume so we don't have to cut trick or treating short.
customer_reviews.author: dell

customer_reviews.title: Fan won't last long.  Beware.
customer_reviews.text: Fits Well. Blower fan is trash. I lasted about 1 hour and the fan blades separated from the axle shaft. I had to disassemble it and glue it back on to the shaft the way it should have been in the first place. There was no adhesive on the shaft. It's just press fitted. After hitting the inside of the case when it came loose, it's now out of balance and makes a loud noise. I expect for for the price.
customer_reviews.author: jared

customer_reviews.title: It's amazing! Just wish my own didn't fog up so much...
customer_reviews.text: I REALLY LOVE THIS ITEM!!!! I bought two (first time users) for my girlfriend and I. We used them to walk through the mall for her birthday. Children loved it, adults loved it. People even took pictures with us... Only thing I didnt like was that one of the costumes, possibly from another buyer (bought one here and the other from another seller) kept fogging the part where I had to look through. And it seemed like it wasn't fully inflated. I dont know..... What I do know is that my girl and I thoroughly enjoyed ourselves and we are gonna do it again soon in another mall. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Marlon G.

customer_reviews.title: One use and done.  Too pricey for the cost
customer_reviews.text: They need to redesign this and maybe make the front main closer a velcro / hook/latch. The front zipper is PLASTIC. Trash. I tried it on once and seemed to fill with air quickly but its like a sauna. second time zipper busted right off before the cold party I was entertaining for. Trash. Not for $50. Cool to look at but too delicate for the price.
customer_reviews.author: S. Reed

customer_reviews.title: Great !
customer_reviews.text: We got this inflatable dinosaur costume for fun. Our toddlers love dinosaurs so what better than to be a dinosaur right?! Well , this thing is awesome but it is very HOT ! I mean be prepared to sweat. At most we can wear it for 10 mins and getting out of it is the best feeling ( all the cold air comes in so it feels great & you can breathe again !) Overall it's great just hot.
customer_reviews.author: Ali Jones

customer_reviews.title: Best costume ever
customer_reviews.text: I got one of these for me and my 4 year old son and to say these costumes are hilarious and Awesome wouldn’t be saying enough. Only two small complaints. My costume was missing one glove which isn’t a huge deal but it would be nice to have both. Also, my sons fan works fine until you screw the back of the battery cover on then it stops working so I just put tape on it instead. If it wasn’t for those small things this would be a 5 star for sure
customer_reviews.author: Michael Ronshausen

customer_reviews.title: Worst quality control, 3 costumes 3 failures!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I returned this twice. The first one had a hole in the head. The second the zipper did not work. The third one my daughter took to one Halloween even and it started to deflate and make strange noises. I took apart the blower and the wheel was no longer press for on the shaft of the electric motor. Being it was the day before actual Halloween, I used a two part epoxy to hold the blower wheel on the motor shaft. I would not recommend this costume. The quality control is horrible and it’s very cheap construction.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Uhhhh....
customer_reviews.text: Super small costume, husband who is 5'8 had a really hard time getting in it. The opening is way to small to get into comfortably. Awkward to bend and get into. Once in it, he could barely see (at night), and kept fogging up. You obviously can't cut a hole in it to see better, or else costume will deflate. It's a great idea, and bystanders love it. So if you're looking to go to something where you'll be mostly stationary, and you're a shorter person, and there is plenty of light, it may work. Just be aware it becomes hot and suffocating too. No way any kid could go trick or treating in this.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan R.

customer_reviews.title: Broke and deflated w/in an hour
customer_reviews.text: This dinosaur costume was amazing and soooooo fun... For about 5 minutes. My son wasn't even wearing this thing for an hour when the zipper broke, which deflated the dinosaur, therefore defeating the whole purpose of the costume. It instantly deflated and he ended up tying it around his waist for the remainder of the night. So now it's totally useless and wasted money. Beyond that this thing is incredibly hot. Nope, I definitely would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kriss

customer_reviews.title: Hilarious!!
customer_reviews.text: This costume is hilarious! My 10yr old son who is 4’8” fits in it perfectly and there is plenty of room for someone much taller. The pump switch piece has a belt hook on it so it doesn’t break or drag the costume down, it came with batteries and it was fully installed upon arrival (even though the directions said you had to install it before putting it on). My son loves this and I can’t wait for him to trick or treat this Halloween!
customer_reviews.author: Marie T.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I chose this dinosaur costume over the others because it has a sound box after buying new batteries the sound box does not work and yes I put the batteries in all ways possible. The hands are on backwards (the back of the hand is where the palm should be) so it looks a little weird. Not impressed and was a huge let down with the sound box not working I bought this for my nephews birthday party still gonna wear it but disappointed oh and it arrived 3 days after the delivery date that I was givin
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Hilarious fun, but short-lived
customer_reviews.text: We bought 2 of these just for fun for our 4th of July family get-together. The first time they were put on, everything seemed fine. They fit nice, inflated well, we’re easy to figure out, and seemed fairly durable. After 5 minutes of use, one costume’s fan stopped working, so the other person went to take the second costume off and the zipper broke. So we got a solid 5 minutes of fun and then it was over :( It was a great 5 minutes though! We returned both costumes for a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Sparks

customer_reviews.title: Hot AF.
customer_reviews.text: So, this thing is pretty neat. That being said, I’m 5’7” and had to kind of hold it up. It was probably a little bit for my size. Also, it’s so damn hot inside it. It was about 80-85 on Halloween here and I got about 15 feet out the front door and was drenched in sweat. I ended up taking it off after about 30 min. I didn’t expect that, but something to pay attention to. It would have been comfortable in 60 degree weather.
customer_reviews.author: A.D.

customer_reviews.title: Adult size is child size!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never been so mad! I have ordered the inflatable unicorn, green man, and red man, all adult sizes and they all fit with room to spare. This item came and it’s marked “adult” size on the outside but inside it says, “one size fits all”. Well one size NEVER fits all and it’s way, way too small. My daughter is 5 ft 2 inches and it’s too small for her. This is a CHILD size costume. My party is tomorrow and now no costume! Thanks a lot Amazon. Another crap product! I’m disgusted.
customer_reviews.author: teridene

customer_reviews.title: Fits my 10 year old.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this costume for my 10 year old son, he used it for Halloween. I was worried that it might fit him big because it is adult size, but it fit him perfect. He loves it and I love it too cause I can spot him a mile away. I was also afraid he was gonna rip it too soon, but it survived Halloween night and a couple other times he wore it just for fun. He is a little shy of 5 feet and weights 95 lbs. Fun costume for adults and kids.
customer_reviews.author: P Rangel

customer_reviews.title: Don't mess with T-Rex
customer_reviews.text: T-Rex will forever be one of the best purchases I've made. I had a blast roaming around inside of this costume. Anyone who felt they could touch me without permission got a nibble from my head. They quickly learned not to mess with me. I was busting moves on the dance floor and posing for pictures. I had a blast. I crashed a party with a momma and baby Gorilla and had a blast scaring the girls there. This costume will forever bring entertainment for years to come! When it got too hot after dancing long and hard on the dance floor, I conveniently was a runner who got away from T-Rex underneath. Such a multifaceted costume!
customer_reviews.author: H.F

customer_reviews.title: Fit OK for 5'8"-5'9" Guy
customer_reviews.text: This is somewhat small for my 5'8"-5'9" boyfriend, but it still worked out really well! The battery operated fan is quiet and it "inflates" quickly. There were already a couple small holes the first time he put it on. They aren't holes from real damage but instead where a couple seams may have popped. The costume hasn't been affected by it at all as it still inflates just fine. This is a hilarious costume and got nonstop laughs both from myself and other people at a small nerdy type of convention. I have to say, the price here is much lower than I've seen at many other places. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: DeedsUA

customer_reviews.title: Grandma Dinosaur Roams Birthday Party!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter had planned a Dinosaur Birthday party for my 5 year old grandson. Of course, being the "cool grandma" that I am, I purchase this costume so there could be a "real" dinosaur at the party! It was a HUGE HIT with the kids and the adults at the party! This costume is so much fun! It is extremely light weight and inflates within seconds of turning on the fan. I am considering getting one of the Raptors too so my husband and I can roam the neighborhood and freak out the neighbors!!
customer_reviews.author: DarsiLama

customer_reviews.title: Order at your own risk Tall People
customer_reviews.text: It’s pretty cool, but definitely fits small to taller people. I’m about 6’2 and I have to hunch over to walk with this thing on. Also the plastic window to see out of wasn’t sewed on properly and poke me in the eye. I had to go to the ER and get my checked out. Other than that it was fun to use.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Hilarious T-Rex
customer_reviews.text: Let me tell you, this is a hilarious costume for Halloween or any other occasion. I ordered Large for my 12-year-old son, he is right at 5' tall. It fit fine, maybe just a tad large, but I was afraid to order a smaller one. When he put it on, I just kept laughing, it was soooo funny, the way he walked or ran. Now the downside: hard to see close in front of you. So you have to be careful when walking up or down the stairs. Also, despite the fan that keeps it inflated, it can get pretty clammy in it after use. Other than that, I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: AnnaC

customer_reviews.title: Fan broke within an hour. Dissatisfaction guaranteed.
customer_reviews.text: My son is 14, 5'7 and thin. He was too tall for this costume. The feet went above his ankle and didn't have the desired effect. An hour into trick or treating the fan stopped working, defective as we tried new batteries and it didn't work. Luckily I had a different costume to give him, but for $50 I expect it to last more than an hour. Such a disappointment. He was so excited to get his costume, but it was a dud.. wah wah wah.
customer_reviews.author: Christinaz Awesome

customer_reviews.title: Hilarious!
customer_reviews.text: My son had the best time running around (and attempting to do push ups) in this costume! It was hysterical to watch him run with those tiny hands. Very cute and he and some other friends all wore these blow up costumes for a really fun Halloween. This costume is a bit difficult to run in, however, with some determination you should do just fine. This also took quite a beating from my 13 year old and never popped or got damaged despite being slammed in doors and stepped on etc. This costume went viral on the internet for a reason, it is a real rib-tickler!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Rawr!!!
customer_reviews.text: This costume is awesome! Feels a little weird when you’re first putting it on like it’s too small, but once it fills with air there’s more then enough room! Very durable, gets a little warm inside but I’m in Wisconsin in October, so that’s a plus in my book! Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Joy K

customer_reviews.title: Brought total joy!
customer_reviews.text: Fit great! This was a huge hit on one hand and a huge disappointment on the other. We planned on using two costumes to dance with my mother and father on their 50th wedding anniversary. One of the costumes inflated great and was a huge hit, but sadly the other costumes zipper failed and the costume couldn’t be properly inflated to be used. The product was replaced but sadly not in time for the event. Great fun and worth the money For the one that worked and the company replaced with no hassle!
customer_reviews.author: Ibuyabunchofstuff

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Literally disappointed..... I used this costume for the first time yesterday and so many bad things happened. First, the zipper came off of one side when I decided to take a break and take it off. Then, after magically fixing it(took me around 30-40 minutes) and not doing the best job at it, the box that holds the batteries came off and the parts went flying to the floor. Had to put tape around the whole thing for it to work again..... Not buying again from this seller :/
customer_reviews.author: Mery Almendares

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it lol
customer_reviews.text: Don’t feel like the fan was good enough to keep the suit inflated well. The look of the suit was great though. Kids loved it and some smaller kids were even scared at the trunk or treat at church. My sister wore the costume and claimed it was a little hot but I think she just wanted to complain about wearing it. I wore it some and it wasn’t that bad. Definitely fun and worth a buy to have some extra fun!
customer_reviews.author: TheDude

customer_reviews.title: JUST BUY IT.
customer_reviews.text: This is the single greatest thing I have ever spent money on. The first time I wore it, a kid punched me in the face. I also wore it for a Halloween thing, and made a couple kids cry. Also ran a marathon where I almost passed out because the carbon dioxide buildup was intense. Everywhere I go with it on people have to take pictures of me in it. A drunk guy ran over a hundred feet to hug me. I even wore it to my best friends wedding. At the bride's behest. Also I'm five feet eleven inches tall and very broad shouldered and it's a bit of a snug fit.
customer_reviews.author: Iganaka

customer_reviews.title: Hilarious and well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic costume! It makes people laugh no matter the age. As someone who has worn several mascot costumes, this one is easy to move in and easy to see out of. If I had to think of a down side, it might be how hot and sweaty you get while inside. But, what are you gonna do? It’s not like you’re supposed to live in it. It’s totally worth buying if you are around kids, Halloween parties, or just like to do quirky things to make people laugh!
customer_reviews.author: TJ Frasco

customer_reviews.title: Good for a laugh, not trick for treating
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son for Halloween. He wore it to a party last week. Air leaks out of the bottom by his shoes when he walks, so he has to stop and stand still every so often, for about 30 seconds as it inflates. The screen that you use to see out, fogs up after a few minutes also. This is a fun costume to wear for a short period of time at a party for some good laughs, but not ideal for running around collecting candy.
customer_reviews.author: lytle42812

customer_reviews.title: Fun,fun,fun
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a Halloween costume. Best thing ever!!! It's hilarious, comfortable and light. Not sure when, other than Halloween, to use it. But if you can find any excuse to wear this ANYWHERE, then take full advantage. It'll definitely get attention and if you know how to dance, you'll be stealing the show 🤣😅😂
customer_reviews.author: Juan

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: This costume is really fun. Guaranteed to be a big hit at any costume party. It does get hot inside, so dress appropriately underneath. I’ve noticed some of the seams looking ragged, but I’ve worn it for Halloween, chased my dog, and also to a party. Fully expect to use it again next year. The head does bobble some, so this might be where the Trex costume might be better. Also, there are some straps inside, I think they’re for when the costume isn’t inflated so you can strap it to you shoulders.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Hilarious costume, not just for Halloween!
customer_reviews.text: This costume was a hit for my 10 year old son and 12 year old daughter! I had to try it out too - im 5'4" and was able to wear it, but I wouldn't suggest the junior size for anyone taller than that. The quality was better than I expected. We had no issues trick or treating outdoors, and it's been worn several times indoors for parties. My kids have used it many times just playing around, doing silly challenges and making funny videos. No rips, holes or fan problems.
customer_reviews.author: Renea C

customer_reviews.title: My favorite purchase so far
customer_reviews.text: My favorite purchase so far! However, it fits very odd. I am 5'1", so the costume is huge lengthwise, yet I have had a hard time keeping the pants legs down. The fan is helpful, but it is still extremely hot and hard to see. But, it's T-Rex!! It's fun and everyone gets a kick out of it!! Definitely worth the money!! My dog absolutely hates it though
customer_reviews.author: Andi N

customer_reviews.title: Funny Dino!
customer_reviews.text: This costume was purchased for my 13 year old daughter. She loves to Dino around in this costume. You have to be careful with the battery/wiring box. All the wires came out and my husband had to solder the wires back to the box. It is small for really tall people, my husband tried to get in the costume (he’s 6’2) it was too short for him. If you want to make a lot of people laugh, this is the costume to get!
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: My kid begged for this
customer_reviews.text: These costumes are popular now. This adult sized version is large for a kid but still works and I was afraid the teen one would be too small. I was probably right. My kid is 11 and it was big but fit well enough. There’s air that blows inside to keep the costume inflated. It’s pretty hilarious seeing it on. If you have a kid they’ll love it, adults with a sense of humor probably will too. Would not work for extremely tall people though. The only downside IMO was the price tag.
customer_reviews.author: A.S.

customer_reviews.title: Very fun costume
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great costume. My 11-year old wanted this for Halloween. The reviews of the child sized costume said it ran small, so not likely to fit a child over 7 or 8. Although he is a small child, I was reluctant to get it. But I was worried the adult costume would be too big. My son is 4'10" tall and only weighs about 75 pounds. Because of the inflating of the costume, he is able to fit it fine.
customer_reviews.author: Busy Managing Mom

customer_reviews.title: Pay attention to the size! Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This the greatest Halloween costume EVER!! Bought the “teen” size for my 9 year old after reading hundreds of reviews for all sizes. Really glad I did! I don’t think the child’s size would have fit him. Super fun! Easy to get on and set up. Laughs for everyone around
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Currier

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING but you need the adult size unless it's for a wee small kid
customer_reviews.text: I bought the teen size for my 12 year old niece and it's too small. She loved it though, and they replaced it the same day with an adult size. Absolutely her favorite birthday present! I can't tell you how much everyone there loved this costume, it was fun for the whole party. 10/10 can recommend!
customer_reviews.author: DeadlyHausfrau

customer_reviews.title: Great costume, Defective zipper
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely hilarious.....for the first four houses my son walked to. After that he was the sadest kid on the block. The zipper broke on the costume and all the air released. For the rest of the night he had to carry his costume and watch other kids trick or treat because the old ass people in the neighborhood won’t give candy to “uncostumed” kids. Of course by the end of the night I took one lady’s bowl of candy and dumped it into my sons bag. Problem not solved but he was happy the candy magically appeared....
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Amazing T Rex Costume
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because an opportunity years ago to brighten my late husbands day in the hospital, but everyone was Out of Stock. My daughter searched everywhere, unfortunately we didn’t find it before he passed. I saw that you had them so in honor I bought it, it fits amazing, the fan blows the costume up and it stays inflated with all sorts of movement, my dogs were so intrigued, I have yet to surprise an awaiting unsuspecting crowd, however the day I do....the costume will definitely be perfect. Fit is amazing, quality is excellent, I would recommend this costume to bring delight to all audiences!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Maughan

customer_reviews.title: Zipper broke after trying on once. Trash product quality
customer_reviews.text: I tried the costume on to test it out before going trick or treating with my nephew. It worked fine (I thought the blower could have been more powerful to get some more support/structre to the costume. When I went to put the suit back on later, the zipper was not working. I ended up having to duct tape myself into the costume in order to keep the air in so that it would work. Trash product.
customer_reviews.author: Zach Ness

customer_reviews.title: Cheap zipper has broken twice and the fan cuts on and off making the costume useless!
customer_reviews.text: The cheap zipper has broken twice now when my son was just trying it one. Luckily I was able to fix it both times. And now we were not even able to make it out the door bc the fan kept cutting off and on. Very disappointed! If I could give it 0 stars I would.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Girl

product_meta.title: Rubie's Adult Official Jurassic World Inflatable Dinosaur Costume
product_meta.description: Officially licensed Jurassic World inflatable costume. Long sleeve inflatable jumpsuit with battery operated fan. Fan requires 4 AA batteries, fan instructions included with costume. Batteries available separately. Please read before buying; costumes are not sized the same as apparel, please review the Rubie's size chart in images, read recent reviews and Q & A to determine best fit. Look for trademark logo on packaging and labels to help assure you’ve received an authentic safety-tested item. Rubie's offers all of your favorite Jurassic World dinosaurs inflatable designs; look for Velociraptor with Sound, Pteranodon, Triceratops, Velociraptor, T-Rex with Sound and the award winning inflatable dinosaur that started it all, the T-Rex; available in standard adult, plus-size and teen! Create your very own family of prehistoric fun and get ready for an unforgettable time! Rubie's offers officially licensed Jurassic World costumes in baby/toddler, child, teen, adult and pet sizes for everyone to join the dress up fun! Coordinate with Rubie's Jurassic World candy bowl holder to complete your dino-theme; search for Blue the Velociraptor or T-Rex to stand guard over your sweet treats. Great for the whole year; inflatable fun runs, parades, dinosaur and prehistoric themed events, school projects, themed parties, comic con, cosplay and of course Trick or Treat and Halloween too! Pair with other "FUN-FLATABLE" costumes by Rubie's for inflated fun time! Fun-Flatables, Rubie's line of inflatable costumes, takes standard costumes and blows them up to the next level. Lightweight tent-like material is expertly "sculpted" with detailed and intricate patterns. Discover fresh takes on classic characters and fun new innovative designs in licensed and non-licensed costumes, accessories and decor! Family-owned, family-focused and based in New York since 1951. As the world's largest designer and manufacturer of costumes Rubie's brings fun and fantasy to dress-up. Rubie's promotes safety in dress-up, so you can relax and have a great time while looking the part. Look to Rubie's for every costume occasion and season!
feature_bullets: OFFICIALLY LICENSED Jurassic World inflatable costume; look for trademark logo on packaging and labels to help assure you’ve received an authentic safety-tested item
LONG SLEEVE inflatable jumpsuit with zipper closure on back and battery operated fan (batteries available separately)
READ BEFORE BUYING: Costumes are not sized the same as apparel, please review the RUBIE'S SIZE CHART IN IMAGES, read recent reviews and Q & A to determine best fit

GROUPS AND FAMILIES: Combine with other Jurassic World costumes by Rubies; look for regular and inflatable designs in baby/toddler, child, adult and pet sizes, also look for Jurassic World accessories like candy bowls, masks and more
FAMILY-OWNED, FAMILY-FOCUSED, and based in the U.S.A. since 1951, Rubie’s has classic and licensed costumes and accessories in sizes and styles for your entire family
